description: This file defines a React functional component named CodeTabs that provides UI tabs to switch between JSX and HTML code, with a button to copy the displayed code to the clipboard. It includes internal state management with useState, event handlers for tab switching and copying, and utility functions for syntax highlighting and clipboard copy operations.

methods.name: CodeTabs({ jsx = "", html = "" })
methods.description: React component that renders tabbed interface for JSX and HTML code with copy functionality.
